          <title>
            <string language="sv">Hinduisk rit</string>
            <string language="en">Hindu rite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinduistisches rite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rite indou</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rite hindu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rite indù</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ινδή ιεροτελεστία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rite hindú</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Släkten samlad inför en viktitg hinduisk rit där ett barn får hål tagna i öronen.</string>
            <string language="en">Relatives are gathered before an important Hindu rite where a child's ears are pierced.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">hinduism</string>
            <string language="en">Hinduism</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwandte werden vor einem wichtigen 
hinduistischen rite erfaßt, in dem die Ohren eines Kindes durchbohrt 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des parents sont recueillis avant un rite 
indou important où les oreilles d'un enfant sont percées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os parentes são recolhidos antes de um rite hindu
importante onde as orelhas de uma criança sejam perfuradas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I parenti sono riuniti prima di un rite 
indù importante in cui gli orecchi del bambino sono perforati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι συγγενείς μαζεύονται πριν από μια σημαντική ινδή 
ιεροτελεστία όπου τα αυτιά ενός παιδιού διαπερνιούνται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recolectan a los parientes antes de un rite hindú
importante donde se perforan los oídos de un niño.</string>
          </description>
